graph_title: Children with disabilities from diseases (aged 0-17 years)
indicator_name: Children with disabilities from diseases (aged 0-17 years)
national_indicator_description: In the indicator of the children disabled from diseases (0-17 years old) it is reflected the share of children disabled from diseases (0-17 years old) from the total number of populations of 0-17 years old and percentage of children disabled from diseases from the total number of children with disabilities by sex and age.
computation_definitions: Disabled - a person who, has a need for social protection due to limitations in living activities because of health impairment.
computation_calculations: The ratio of children with disabilities from diseases to the population of the appropriate age.
